Smart Hairbrush with Sensors: A hairbrush with sensors that monitor the health of your hair and provide personalized hair care recommendations. It could also detect split ends, breakage, and other hair problems, and alert you when it's time to cut your hair.

Hairbrush with Built-in Camera: A hairbrush with a built-in camera that captures images of your hair and provides feedback on the condition of your hair. It could also suggest hairstyles and color treatments based on your hair type and color.
Hairbrush with Hair Dye: A hairbrush with a built-in hair dye that allows you to color your hair while brushing it. It could also provide a color guide to ensure that you get the perfect shade.

Hairbrush with Hair Styling Tools: A hairbrush with built-in hair styling tools such as curling irons, straighteners, and blow dryers. It could also provide a variety of bristle sizes and shapes to suit different hair types.

Hairbrush with LED Lights: A hairbrush with LED lights that provide a gentle massage to your scalp while brushing your hair. It could also have a built-in speaker that plays relaxing music to help you relax and unwind.
